thread.title: C-Level honorees share their best business advice
thread.title_full: C-Level honorees share their best business advice

author: Susan Lundine
title: C-Level honorees share their best business advice
text: Be accountable to your team and always lead by example. Dr. Daniel P. Kelly , scientific director, Sanford Burnham Presbys Medical Discovery Institute Success requires strategic “out-of-the-box” collaboration. Working as an interdisciplinary team is critical in biomedical research. Chris Nolen , director of construction services, Elipsis Engineering & Consulting Strive to always build a relationship of trust among everyone you work with, no matter their responsibility. Jean Nowry , executive vice president and CFO, Massey Services Inc. Be a student of business — never stop learning. There’s no one perfect career path. Combine your experience, education and passion and find the thing that makes you come alive. Pursue that. Lloyd Parke r, COO and co-founder, Mad Cap Events LLC dba Savage Race Take time to listen to your employees and make sure you have the right people in the right positions.
